= Documentation ==

The SfePy documentation is prepared using [http://sphinx.pocoo.org/ Sphinx].

 * [http://docs.sfepy.org/doc] - the documentation for the latest release
 * [http://docs.sfepy.org/doc-devel] - the documentation for the current development version

== Publications & Presentations ==

Short introduction of !SfePy and its scientific applications
 * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/sfepy_slides_handout.pdf sfepy_slides_handout.pdf]
 * problem description files described in Section Example in the presentation (should work with recent git sources...):
   * stationary Laplace equation: [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/example_laplace.py example_laplace.py]
   * non-stationary Laplace equation: [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/example_laplace_time.py example_laplace_time.py]
   * mesh for both the examples: [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/simple.mesh simple.mesh] (medit mesh format), [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/simple.vtk simple.vtk] (VTK format, not required by the examples)


Below is a list of documents related to !SfePy.

 * [http://www.euroscipy.org/index.html EuroSciPy2009], Leipzig, Germany, July 25-276 2009
  * basic introduction + selected scientific applications (mostly nice, colorful figures)
  * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/euroscipy2009_slides.pdf euroscipy2009_slides.pdf]
 * [http://www.scipy.org/EuroSciPy2008 EuroSciPy2008], Leipzig, Germany, July 26-27, 2008
  * updated slides of PANM 14 (see below) + some new pages
  * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/euroscipy2008_slides.pdf euroscipy2008_slides.pdf]
 * 5th International Workshop on Parallel Matrix Algorithms and Applications (PMAA'08). Neuchâtel, Switzerland, June 20-22, 2008
  * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/pmaa08.pdf pmaa08.pdf]
 * Seminar on Programs and Algorithms of Numerical Mathematics 14 (PANM 14), Dolní Maxov, Czech Republic, June 1-6, 2008
  * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/panm2008_slides.pdf panm2008_slides.pdf]
 * Poster presented at [http://www.math.ch/colloqnum08/ Colloque Numérique Suisse / Schweizer Numerik Kolloquium]:
  * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/cns2008_abstract.pdf cns2008_abstract.pdf]
  * [http://sfepy.googlecode.com/svn/web/docs/cns2008_poster.pdf cns2008_poster.pdf]
